trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Billings
There were no other sightings in Billings on or around November 6th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was talking on the Phone to a Friend who lives out of town, smoking a cigarette and looking in the sky at Orion and Pleiades (my favorite star cluster) Then I saw this... Movement, at first I thought it was a Satellite then I noticed there was 7 reddish orange circular objects all moving at the same speed in what looked like a flight pattern. It appeared as if it was One Half of a V formation heading East to west. At that time I told my friend that I was seeing something very strange in the sky. I told him I would call him back and got off the phone. the hairs on the back of my neck stood up. The objects looked to be perfectly Spaced between them and started to turn Southwest and continued heading that direction staying in the same pattern. I ran inside to get my Camera (took about 20 sec.) shut off the porch light and by the time I took out the camera it was gone. I stayed outside for about a half hour looking at the sky but it never came back and I never saw anything else out of the ordinary. Looked like this... O O O O O O O
